data.title: Roberto Coin Official Website
data.meta_description: Discover Roberto Coin's elegant and timeless necklaces, bracelets, earrings, rings, pendants and bangles. Discover our Italian handmade collections.
data.text:
LOVE IN VERONA

PLAY WITH SOUND

Collections Spotlight

ART DECO

The design of Roberto Coin’s Art Deco collection is a symbol you can wear – a jewel transformed into a work of art. Discover the new pieces of Mini Art Deco.

VENETIAN PRINCESS

The magic of jewelry transforms the coldness of titanium into blooming petals.

CELEBRity spotlight

Kate Hudson

Roberto Coin for Flaunt in the Duchessa Collection.

PLAY WITH SOUND

CELEBRITY spotlight

CYNTHIA ERIVO SHINES AT THE 2024 OLYMPIC OPENING CEREMONIES

Everyone was green with envy seeing Tony winner Cynthia Erivo wearing Roberto Coin jewelry at the 2024 Olympic Opening Ceremonies in Paris. Performing with her wicked co-star Ariana Grande, Erivo was glittering in green and gold from head to toe.

COLLECTION spotlight

LOVE IN VERONA

How do you sweeten the memories of a trip? With words, colors and souvenirs that coat your memories in gold. Let yourself be pampered by the Love in Verona collection.

COLLECTION spotlight

FIND THE PERFECT GIFT

Discover Roberto Coin’s selection of jewelry for your gifts.

STORIES

The latest from Roberto Coin

Domino and the power of games

In 2016, Shonda Rhimes participated in a TED conference with an amazing talk focused on the value of games. She told how a few years earlier, when her enthusiasm was crushed by commitments and stress, she chose to initiate what she called her YEAR OF YES to rekindle it – how, for an entire year she would say YES to every proposal outside her comfort zone.

Dreams that come true

Mother’s Day is right around the corner! That time of the year that we give well-deserved recognition to the person who’s done so much for us.

THE EXPLORER OF BEAUTY

Roberto Coin has traveled the world in search of beautiful inspirations for the jewelry that bears his name.

The Online Experience
